query:
-- Verificar IDs
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1) as patientId,
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com') as therapistId;

-- Criar agendamentos com IDs diretos
INSERT INTO appointments (patientId, therapistUserId, therapyType, startTime, endTime, status)
VALUES 
  ((SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1), 1, 'psicologia', '2026-01-15 09:00:00', '2026-01-15 10:00:00', 'scheduled'),
  ((SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1), 1, 'fonoaudiologia', '2026-01-17 10:00:00', '2026-01-17 11:00:00', 'scheduled'),
  ((SELECT id FROM patients WHERE name = 'Miguel Santos Silva' LIMIT 1), 1, 'terapia_ocupacional', '2026-01-19 14:00:00', '2026-01-19 15:00:00', 'scheduled');
